slides.title: What is Vue.js?
slides.content:
# The Progressive Framework ğŸ––

Vue.js is designed to be incrementally adoptable.

- **Approachable:** easy to pick up (HTML/CSS/JS knowledge).
- **Versatile:** scaling from a library to a full-featured framework.
- **Performant:** fast Virtual DOM.

slides.title: Event Handling
slides.content:
# Listening to Events ğŸ‘‚

Use `v-on` directive to listen to DOM events.

```html
<!-- Full syntax -->
<button v-on:click="count++">Add 1</button>

<!-- Shorthand -->
<button @click="count++">Add 1</button>
```

Summary
slides.content:
# Recap: Vue Basics ğŸ“

Simple yet powerful.

- **Declarative Rendering:** `{{ }}` text.
- **Attributes:** `:src` (v-bind).
- **Events:** `@click` (v-on).
- **Two-way:** `v-model`.
- **Computed:** Cached values derived from state.
